attributes.action: recover from the employer the amount of income support paid to anyone in full-time employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is in full-time employment , yet nevertheless qualifies for Income Support, then such support in effect constitutes a subsidy by the taxpayer to low-paying employers. The aim would be to encourage employers to pay an adequate wage, thereby reducing the requirement for Income Support, rather than introduce more benefits bureaucracy.
